p: Our study has limitations. First, we did not include DHPCs in our study as they differ substantially from the other aRMM modalities due their non-recurring nature and broader scope of use. Importantly, DHPCs are the only type of aRMM that are not recorded in annex IID of the MA, and information on issued DHPCs is not systematically reflected on the EMA website. Although several national competent authorities publish DHPCs on their websites, studies have shown inconsistencies between national competent authorities with regard to dissemination and content of DHPCs [ 19].
